summary: Successfully tested the new comparison feature (Karşılaştır button and modal). All requested features are working correctly: Login flow, Dashboard stock selection, Analysis page, Similar stocks search (30-60 seconds), Similar stock details panel with Compare button, and the Comparison Modal with side-by-side charts.
passed_tests: Login with test2@test.com / test1234 - SUCCESS
Dashboard loads with 444 BIST stocks
Stock selection combobox (THYAO) - Working
Candlestick chart loads for selected stock
Analiz Et button navigates to analysis page
Analysis page shows candlestick chart with peak/trough markers
Summary statistics display correctly
Dip & Tepe Noktaları section with tabs working
Benzer Hisseleri Bul button triggers search
Similar stocks search completes in ~50 seconds
20 similar patterns found for THYAO
Similar stocks list displays with similarity scores
Clicking on similar stock shows details panel
Details panel shows: Benzerlik, Korelasyon, Güncel Fiyat, Dönem Getirisi
Dip/Tepe Noktaları displayed in details panel
NEW: Karşılaştır (Compare) button appears next to Analiz Et button
NEW: Compare button click opens comparison modal
NEW: Modal title 'Kalıp Karşılaştırması' displayed
NEW: Modal shows similarity score (83.47%) and correlation (61.84%)
NEW: Left chart shows reference stock (THYAO) with 'Referans' badge
NEW: Right chart shows similar stock (DERIM) with 'Benzer' badge
NEW: Both charts display candlestick data with peak/trough markers
NEW: Peak/trough comparison tables displayed for both stocks
NEW: Modal can be closed with X button
seed_data_creation: None required - using existing test user
context_for_next_testing_agent: New comparison feature fully tested and working. The 'Karşılaştır' (Compare) button appears in the selected similar stock details panel after finding similar stocks. Clicking it opens a Dialog modal with: (1) Similarity score and correlation stats at top, (2) Two candlestick charts side by side - reference stock on left with 'Referans' badge, similar stock on right with 'Benzer' badge, (3) Peak/trough comparison tables at bottom. Similar stocks search takes 30-60 seconds to complete. Test user test2@test.com / test1234 is available for testing.
